changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for covid 19 assessment form

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam
changeSet.comment: Adding codes to specific concepts

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Initial', 'Discharge') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, Type of Assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to CV, Type of Assessment

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Suspect', 'Confirmed','Probable','Not a Case') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, COVID-19 Case");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to CV, COVID-19 Case

changeSet.author: Bindu, Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Nasal', 'Oropharyngeal','Blood','Not a Case') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, Type of Specimen");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No","Yes") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, Contact with a Confirmed COVID-19 Case in Last 14 Days?");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("No","Yes") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CV, Has Patient Traveled in the Past 14 Days?");
